headline.main: Smoking Curbs Divide Hearings In City Council

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A newly proposed antismoking bill for New York City got mixed reviews before the City Council yesterday. Some Council members who primarily represent minority groups called the measure too restrictive, while the City Health Commissioner said it was not restrictive enough.
